mapper.select: select id from mm_inpayment_ti where to_char(INPAYMENTDATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(now(), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
mapper.update: create temporary table mm_temp_handover_events_td ( listno bigint(30) not null, subcompany varchar(20) not null, unitcode varchar(20) not null, oldno bigint(30) not null, newno bigint(30) not null, fatherno bigint(30), sonno bigint(30), businessone char(3) not null, businesstwo char(3) not null, opcode varchar(15) not null, opdatetime datetime not null, agentcode varchar(300), departmentcode varchar(20) not null, currencycode varchar(10) not null, insuredcode varchar(300) not null, insuredname varchar(3000), insurencecount bigint(30), amount decimal(16,2) not null, basecurrencycode varchar(10) not null, baseamount decimal(16,2) not null, businessattr varchar(3) not null, businesschannel varchar(30), hasplan char(1) not null, classescode varchar(100) not null, risktype char(2) not null, customercode varchar(300), customername varchar(3000), transactorcode varchar(100) not null, signdatetime datetime, startdatetime datetime not null, enddatetime datetime not null, policyno varchar(80), endorseno varchar(80), claimno varchar(80), returnno varchar(100), auditstatus char(1) not null, dailyauditno varchar(100), checkdatetime datetime, auditdatetime datetime, opstatus char(1) not null, datasource varchar(30) not null, timestamp datetime not null, lastopdatetime datetime not null, inputdatetime datetime not null, hibernateversion bigint(30) not null, issplitted varchar(1), summaryno varchar(60), modifydesc varchar(600), tounitcode varchar(20), newdetailno bigint(30) default 0 not null, olddetailno bigint(30) default 0 not null, excangerate decimal(16,8), groupflag varchar(10), businessno varchar(60), businesssource varchar(10), grouptype varchar(10), batchnumber varchar(30), outdatasource varchar(30), customersource varchar(30), agenttype varchar(2), farmflagcode varchar(100), premiumsource varchar(30), useporperty varchar(30), vehkind varchar(8), characteristics varchar(100), farmtypedetail varchar(100), farmflag varchar(100), farpolicytype varchar(1), carusetype varchar(10), primary key(listno) )
